newsitem.title: INDONESIA: Indonesia Bank Arya to list 24.5 pct stake.
newsitem.headline: Indonesia Bank Arya to list 24.5 pct stake.

text.p: Indonesia's Bank Arya Panduarta, a member of the Ongko Group congolomerate said on Friday it planned to float a 24.5-percent stake later in June or early in July.
"We plan to float 98 million shares on the Jakarta Stock Exchange," bank commissioner Irjanto Ongko told a news conference.
Ongko said the offering price would range between 900 to 1,100 rupiah with total proceeds expected to be about 90 billion to 100 billion rupiah.
He said the bank expected to book a net profit of 37.4 billion rupiah in 1997, higher than its 1996's net profit of 8.8 billion rupiah.
"Based on our first quarter net profit of 8.7 billion rupiah, we believe we can achieve the target of 37.4 billion rupiah," he said.
Local brokerage firm Bhakti Investama will act as lead underwriter.
